alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 8:08PM CST until December 17 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 27.2 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 18.6 Wed 7 pm CST 26.8 26.0 21.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST.
